name: Union (iaz)
description:
Trapped on an alien planet, you must hold out against waves of alien fighters. Thankfully, your experimental ship is equipped with a UNION drive, which allows you to absorb a single enemy at a time and use their energy as a weapon. Be warned, however —  this weaponized state renders you immobile,  only lasts a limited time, and leaves you vulnerable to attack. Different enemy species provide different types of projectiles, so think fast and choose your targets carefully!

Artwork by @Willetton, sound design by @Cbasedexplorer and code by @IsaacAzuelos. The project is on GitHub too.
